// ============================================
// QUARTO RESUME TEMPLATE - TWO COLUMN DESIGN
// ============================================
// This template creates a clean, professional two-column resume
// inspired by modern minimalist design principles.
//
// CUSTOMIZATION GUIDE:
// 1. Update the resume_header() section with your personal information
// 2. Modify LEFT COLUMN content (Profile, Experience)
// 3. Modify RIGHT COLUMN content (Skills, Education, Certifications)
// 4. Adjust column widths by changing (60%, 40%) ratios if needed
// ============================================

// ============================================
// CUSTOM FUNCTIONS FOR RESUME SECTIONS
// ============================================

#let resume_header(name, title, email, phone, address, linkedin) = {
  set text(font: "Arial", size: 10pt)
  
  // Name and title section
  block(
    width: 100%,
    [
      #set text(size: 20pt, weight: "regular", tracking: 2pt)
      #upper(name)
      
      #v(0.3em)
      #set text(size: 10pt, weight: "regular", tracking: 1pt)
      #upper(title)
      
      #v(0.5em)
      #line(length: 100%, stroke: 0.5pt + black)
    ]
  )
  
  // Contact information grid
  v(0.5em)
  grid(
    columns: (1fr, 1fr),
    column-gutter: 2em,
    row-gutter: 0.3em,
    [üìß #email],
    [üì± #phone],
    [üìç #address],
    [üîó #linkedin]
  )
  v(0.8em)
  line(length: 100%, stroke: 0.5pt + black)
}

#let section_header(title) = {
  v(0.8em)
  block[
    #set text(size: 11pt, weight: "regular", tracking: 1pt)
    #upper(title)
    #v(0.3em)
    #line(length: 100%, stroke: 0.5pt + black)
  ]
  v(0.5em)
}

#let experience_entry(title, company, date, items) = {
  block(
    width: 100%,
    breakable: true,
    [
      #set text(size: 10pt)
      #text(weight: "bold")[#title] \
      #text(style: "italic")[#company / #date]
      #v(0.3em)
      
      #for item in items [
        ‚Ä¢ #item \
      ]
      #v(0.5em)
    ]
  )
}

#let education_entry(degree, university, location, date) = {
  block(
    width: 100%,
    [
      #set text(size: 10pt)
      #text(weight: "bold")[#degree] \
      #text(style: "italic")[#university] \
      #text(size: 9pt)[#location] \
      #text(size: 9pt)[#date]
      #v(0.5em)
    ]
  )
}

#let certification_entry(cert_name, university, location) = {
  block(
    width: 100%,
    [
      #set text(size: 10pt)
      #text(weight: "bold")[#cert_name] \
      #text(style: "italic")[#university] \
      #text(size: 9pt)[#location]
      #v(0.5em)
    ]
  )
}

#let skill_item(skill) = {
  block(
    width: 100%,
    [
      ‚Ä¢ #skill
    ]
  )
}

#let reference_entry(name, position, company, phone, email) = {
  block(
    width: 100%,
    [
      #set text(size: 9pt)
      üë§ #text(weight: "bold")[#name] \
      #text(size: 8pt, style: "italic")[#position] \
      #text(size: 8pt)[#company] \
      #text(size: 8pt)[#phone] \
      #text(size: 8pt)[#email]
      #v(0.5em)
    ]
  )
}

#set par(justify: true, leading: 0.65em)

  paper: "us-letter",

)
